Posts.Content: luvbeagles wrote: I had a biopsy done for a 3mm mass and dr. said he missed it and now need it done again. So stressed and worried do to family history. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: biopsy missed 3mm mass luvbeagles proudtospin

Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2013 08:34AM luvbeagles wrote: Family history is mom died at 48 from breast cancer and maternal grandma was diagnosed when she was 70. I am 43. So this is why I am nervous. Also surgeon said mass was slightly spiculated. I guess it is what it is and will fight it head on if I am diagnosed.
Posts.Title: biopsy missed 3mm mass luvbeagles proudtospin

Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2013 09:42AM luvbeagles wrote: I know it is amazing and I was glad I chose the new 3d mammogram. Also thankful that they did an ultrasound after the biopsy that showed he missed it. I just hope they can hit the mark this time because this waiting is driving me nuts. Just want to move on to next step be it good or bad. I am a planner and a slight control freak :). Loss of control is horrible.
